tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE annotations (
    annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    annotation_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES documents(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NLP_Models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    model_description TEXT,
    task_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES NLP_Tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NLP_Results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    dataset_id INT,
    result_details JSON,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES NLP_Models(model_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (dataset_id) REFERENCES NLP_Datasets(dataset_id)
);
